definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Only man has the power to do this.
sentences.chinese: 只有人才有造句的本領。

sentences.english: The young Charlton's greatest strengths were his speed and body swerve.
sentences.chinese: 年輕時查爾頓的看家本領是快速的奔跑和身體變向。

sentences.english: Eleanor jumps up and down, eager to show off her skills.
sentences.chinese: 埃莉諾跳上蹦下，急着要炫耀她的本領。

sentences.english: And even though I despised school, I thank them for the education they helped me acquire.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我輕視教育，但是我感激他們教會我這些本領。

sentences.english: Manageability is the ability to manipulate the communication system.
sentences.chinese: 處置性是操息通訊編制的本領。

sentences.english: He had a legendary ability to learn while slumbering .
sentences.chinese: 他有一項傳奇式的本領，就是在熟睡中學習。

sentences.english: Shea thinks our ancestors threw rocks pretty well.
sentences.chinese: 謝伊認爲我們的祖先投擲石塊的本領相當不錯。

sentences.english: Acquirers will also have to get better at picking winners.
sentences.chinese: 收購家也必須改進自己挑選贏家的本領。

sentences.english: In order to learn the skills, he is not afraid of hard, full of art.
sentences.chinese: 爲了學本領，他不怕艱苦，到處拜師學藝。
阿格雷爾有什麼特別本領？

sentences.english: Xiaoping always has luck and ability to be unexpected rescued from a desperate situation.
sentences.chinese: 小萍從來有絕處逢生的本領和運氣。

sentences.english: I will do is the ability tasty Egg Fried Rice.
sentences.chinese: 我的本領就是會做香噴噴的蛋炒飯。

sentences.english: Capitalism's ability to take things downmarket also has its limits.
sentences.chinese: 資本主義把事物“低端化”的本領也有其不足之處。

sentences.english: This idiom excoriates those who show accomplishments in front experts.
sentences.chinese: “班門弄斧”這個成語，用來在行家面前顯示本領。

sentences.english: "The eight immortals crossing the sea" is used to symbolize to complete a task through someone's special skills.
sentences.chinese: “八仙過海”比喻各自有一套辦法或本領去完成任務。

sentences.english: We also discuss how the mass resolution can be further improved.
sentences.chinese: 文中還討論了提高質量分辨本領的方法。

definition: well qualified/competent/to be equal to the task/able to do sth very well
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
